pr_title: allow expansion of some Python objects in Environment pane

timeline.message: display summary of Python DataFrames in Environment Pane
tweaks around choice for data viewer / object explorer
only activate Python in Environment Pane when reticulate REPL active

timeline.bodyText: I've adopted this convention for tracking TODO items on separate feature branches. Let me know if this feels appropriate.
timeline.author: kevinushey

timeline.bodyText: This is necessary so that output from pandas.to_string() is formatted correctly (as it uses whitespace for alignment)
